characters: Driver of a white sedan, motorcyclist
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on an urban road with moderate traffic. The white sedan ahead is maintaining a steady speed, while a motorcyclist is seen on the right side, gradually overtaking the self-driving vehicle.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a consistent speed and lane position, following the white sedan ahead. The motorcyclist on the right side is overtaking the self-driving vehicle, moving ahead.
key_objects: 1) Front: A white sedan, approximately 10 meters away, maintaining a steady speed. 2) Right: A motorcyclist, approximately 5 meters away, overtaking the self-driving vehicle.
